Reviews.Title: Absolutely innovative
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: A big jump in tech from a normal flip phone. GPS is magnificent! Backflip smartphone is the smart choice for you

Reviews.Title: MY PHONE ISN'T WORKING GOOD
Reviews.Author: KAWUNKAWUN
Reviews.Content: My phone is freezing and restarting on its own. I wanted the samsung galaxy but from exprinece i'm not sure i'll get it from here again
